availability.description: The surface mass balance anomaly can be obtained via the ISMIP6 ftp server (email ismip6@gmail.com to obtain the login information). Modeling groups should use the 1km version to conservatively interpolate to their model native grid.
availability.name: InitMIP prescribed SMB anomaly

description: Apply a prescribed Surface Mass Balance (SMB) anomaly, provided by ISMIP6,  which mimics the expected SMB change from the end of the 20th century to the end of the 21st century.
name: InitMIP SMB anomaly
rationale: To test the model response to a large perturbation in ice sheet surface mass balance.
longName: Surface Mass Balance anomaly for the ISMIP6 InitMIP experiments
keywords: ISMIP6, ISMIP6-specified input, InitMIP, SMB, surface mass balance
